name: Chickadee's dungeon
description:
Concept 

The objective is to go through a dungeon composed of several rooms. 

Attack left or right with the weapons you get in the dungeon. Collect relics that will provide you with passive effects.

Keys
  • Left/Right: attack
  • Up/Down : change your weapon
Credits
  • Jeanne Prigent : game artist (@JanePrigent)
  • Christophe Coyard : developer (@twotinydice)
  • Sounds: freesounds.org
